bibl.title: Decorated Ptolemaic Faience Bowls from Athribis (Tell Atrib), Nile Delta.
bibl.note: Form and decoration. - Bowls with two-sided decoration of figural-floral-geometric charachter. - Bowls with two-sided decoration of floral and geometric character. - Bowl with one-sided (?) geometric and floral decoration. - Bowls with decoration reduced to a wavy line and monochromatic bands. - Dating and changes in the production methods and decoration techniques of relief-decorated faience bowls from Tell Atrib. - Pp. 255-269: Catalogue.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.seg: Fabian Welc, Decorated Ptolemaic Faience Bowls from Athribis (Tell Atrib), Nile Delta.

Form and decoration. - Bowls with two-sided decoration of figural-floral-geometric charachter. - Bowls with two-sided decoration of floral and geometric character. - Bowl with one-sided (?) geometric and floral decoration. - Bowls with decoration reduced to a wavy line and monochromatic bands. - Dating and changes in the production methods and decoration techniques of relief-decorated faience bowls from Tell Atrib. - Pp. 255-269: Catalogue.
